title: Sick champ.
body:
https://vimeo.com/214263357

0/6. Still 2 shots someone who's fed.

replies.body: She probably shouldn't walk into melee range of a Nasus and miss every proc of her E. :P

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=JHgJ5uzW,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-22T02:37:40.438+0000)
>
> She probably shouldn't walk into melee range of a Nasus and miss every proc of her E. :P

I knew he was there. I went in for that free gold and then his Q did 60% of my HP and mistakes were made. I destroyed him in lane. Whenever he went to Q a minion, I took 40% of his HP. He had no stacks but then wtf is that damage?
He melee, you ranged. Melee range good for Susan. Walking up to say hi to doge not smart.

0/6 doesn't mean the Nasus isn't fed.
10CS = 1 Champ Kill.
On Nasus that 10CS means additional power as well as the 300 gold.

A guide to Nasus is:
If he's 0/6 and HIS tower is dead, you've likely won because he'll be behind on CS as well.
If he's 0/6 and your tower is down, he's won.
If he's 0/6 and both towers are still up, he's won, and your tower wont be there soon, unless if he wants to farm more.

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=JHgJ5uzW,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-04-22T06:13:32.685+0000)
>
> 0/6 doesn't mean the Nasus isn't fed.
> 10CS = 1 Champ Kill.
> On Nasus that 10CS means additional power as well as the 300 gold.
> 
> A guide to Nasus is:
> If he's 0/6 and HIS tower is dead, you've likely won because he'll be behind on CS as well.
> If he's 0/6 and your tower is down, he's won.
> If he's 0/6 and both towers are still up, he's won, and your tower wont be there soon, unless if he wants to farm more.

Lol.

15cs = 1 kill. I was top lane, as you can see, and the map shows that he got hammered. I had his entire lane at 11 minutes. He had no farm. He was so far behind and still 2 hit me. That's bs.
clearly u dont understand how stackers work
Its nasus, seems like carelessness on your part
